alert.note: Alert for Iron; St. Francois; Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 6:08PM CDT until July 08 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Iron County in southeastern Missouri... Southeastern Washington County in east central Missouri... Southwestern St. Francois County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 608 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bismarck, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bismarck, Pilot Knob and Iron Mountain around 620 PM CDT. Iron Mountain Lake around 625 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Park Hills. This also includes St. Joe State Park, Fort Davidson Historic Site, and Elephant Rocks State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
